description_en: Gini coefficient by state from 1974 to 2022.
description_ms: Pekali Gini mengikut negeri dari 1974 hingga 2022.
methodology_en:
The primary Gini coefficient at state-level is computed based on the distribution of households' gross monthly income, where:
 - Gini coefficient values are bounded within 0 and 1, with higher values indicating greater income inequality.
 - A value of 0 indicates perfect equality (i.e. that every household has the same income).
 - A value of 1 indicates total inequality (i.e. that 1 household earns all the income while all others earn nothing).

Because the computation of the Gini coefficient relies on household income data, Malaysia's Gini coefficient statistics are produced and published together with statistics on household income derived from the Household Income and Expenditure Survey (HIES), which is conducted at least twice within any 5-year period. For full details on the methodology, especially the computation of the PLI and its evolution and nuances, please refer to the [technical notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
methodology_ms:
Pekali Gini utama di peringkat negeri dihasilkan berdasarkan taburan pendapatan kasar bulanan isi rumah:
 - Nilai pekali Gini adalah antara 0 dengan 1.
 - Nilai 0 bermaksud kesamarataan total (iaitu semua isi rumah mempunyai pendapatan sama).
 - Nilai 1 bermaksud ketidaksamarataan total (iaitu 1 isi rumah mempunyai semua pendapatan di samping yang lain tidak mendapat apa-apa).

Oleh sebab penghasilan pekali Gini memerlukan data pendapatan isi rumah, statistik pekali Gini Malaysia dihasilkan dan diterbitkan bersama dengan statistik pendapatan isi rumah yang dihasilkan daripada Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah (HIES), yang dilaksanakan sekurang-kurangnya dua kali dalam mana-mana tempoh 5 tahun. Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, terutamanya mengenai pengiraan PGK serta evolusi dan nuansanya, sila rujuk kepada [nota teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
caveat_en:
Given that the data is produced from surveys spanning over half a century, it should be noted that:
 - Kuala Lumpur was gazzeted as a Federal Territory on 1 February 1974. Accordingly, data for W.P. Kuala Lumpur is only available from 1976. Prior to that, data for residents of W.P. Kuala Lumpur was included under Selangor.
 - Labuan was gazetted as a Federal Territory on 16 April 1984. However, due to limitations in sampling, data for W.P. Labuan is only available from 2007. Prior to that, data for residents of W.P. Labuan was included under Sabah.
 - Putrajaya was gazzeted as a Federal Territory on 1 February 2001. However, due to limitations in sampling, data for W.P. Putrajaya is only available from 2007. Prior to that, data for residents of W.P. Putrajaya was included under Selangor.
caveat_ms:
Memandangkan bahawa data ini dihasilkan daripada survey yang menjangkau lebih dari setengah abad, harus diambil perhatian bahawa:
 - Kuala Lumpur diwartakan sebagai Wilayah Persekutuan pada 1 Februari 1974. Oleh itu, data untuk W.P. Kuala Lumpur hanya tersedia mulai 1976. Sebelum itu, data untuk penduduk W.P. Kuala Lumpur adalah sebahagian daripada Selangor.
 Labuan diwartakan sebagai Wilayah Persekutuan pada 16 April 1984. Namun, disebabkan oleh kekangan dalam pengsampelan, data bagi W.P. Labuan hanya tersedia mulai 2007. Sebelum itu, data untuk penduduk W.P. Labuan adalah sebahagian daripada Sabah.
 - Putrajaya diwartakan sebagai Wilayah Persekutuan pada 1 Februari 2001. Namun, disebabkan oleh kekangan dalam pengsampelan, data bagi W.P. Putrajaya hanya tersedia mulai 2007. Sebelum itu, data untuk penduduk W.P. Putrajaya adalah sebahagian daripada Selangor.
publication_en: The [Household Income Survey Report, 2022](https://open.dosm.gov.my/hies/household_income_2022.pdf), the latest edition of the household income statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on household income](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/household-income-expenditure) which enables you to explore Malaysia's household income data interactively.
publication_ms: [Laporan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah, 2022](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/hies/household_income_2022.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik pendapatan isi rumah yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM juga membekalkan [_dashboard_ pendapatan isi rumah](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/household-income-expenditure) yang membolehkan anda menerokai data pendapatan isi rumah Malaysia secara interaktif.
